title: I'm seriously fucking tired of playing with trios in ranked
body: With or against, it is getting fucking annoying.

replies.body:
Had an absolutely brutal time last night, played with 3 different Chinese dynamic ques. They were only 2/3 mans, but the broken English and fact that they are all generally terrible at the game makes it a very frustrating experience.

Typically they start off with broken English, you'll get the standard "fuck you dog mother" insults, and then actual Chinese. And I've found that me not wanting these Chinese dynamic ques on the NA server is "racism".

Well, as much as you are not a racist, you do not know if these players were actually from China or not. They could've moved to America or been raised up in an environment where they only speak English as a second language. 

Also, I'm curious, when you say they spoke in Chinese, do you mean like this 电话?  I don't know a lot about computer models, but how would people be able to switch from English to Chinese characters, really fast?

It's a special keyboard, my friend has one.
It looks the exact same but when she holds a button and presses a key combination it gives a chinese character.
Shows up as squares in league though, 
so usually they'll just write it phonetically in roman letters.
You don't even need a special keyboard. You can literally just hold the windows key and spacebar to shift between preset languages if you set it first.

O.o orly?  Hers had the special characters printed on it in blue, 
but I'm glad it's not necessary anymore :D

Thank you for letting me know something new^^
when you see "Shabi" and "cao ni ma" those are typical chinese curse fyi

They don't use character for me, the ones I see just type out the pinyin without any accent marks on it, which you can understand if you're good enough at Chinese.

Thank god I understand Chinese, it helps a lot in these types of games.
Gotta say. When you say something like Chinese players "are all generally terrible," that does come across as somewhat racist.

Honestly I think I'm equally good with Chinese and English, but I typically only type English in NA. It's always hilarious to have this Chinese rager go full ham on you with Chinese insults, and then shut up as soon as I reply in Chinese and tell them to stfu.

Eh, you'll see this from Koreans too.

Shows up with a name like Park Tae Woo or KimchiMaster.

"u mid i jg?" in champ select.

Types in boxes only during chat.

Team gives up FB during invade?

Dance at fountain.

Team doesn't listen to his personal calls? AFK until you do.

Down 5 kills at 15 minutes? "ff 20".

i've been reporting people who have been displaying negative toxicity and abusing language barriers to say very negative things to other players. Just last week, I reported a zyra who was cussing at the ezreal in romanized chinese ( I know what mandarin sounds like so saying it out loud has a specific accent to it). I inferred that he was saying negative things because he told me to shut up in english and he typed in chinese after each time the ezreal died and also typed "garbage adc".
i've had to suffer through this garbage no less than 4 times now, and that's only with chinese trios, say nothing of the countless duos/solos, but they're much less game impacting than the trios
I'm chinese and I knkw chinese swear words very well but "fuck you dog mother" literally have no logical meaning in chinese.
I got tired of that shit too. That's why I have played only 1 game in almost 2 weeks. Fuck this game.

Just lost a ranked game because an ADC/Sup/JG trio abandoned lane completely to play TDM and chase kills while Yi pushed botlane to the inhibitor multiple times without any response. Funny enough me and the midlaner got S grades, as if the game knew we were dealt a shitty hand.

I hope you mean ranked

because I enjoy playing with my friends in norms a lot. lmao.
I do
Same

Well, I kinda quit DQ a couple weeks ago, but today I said "alright, I'm gonna play one game". I did it because normals are terribly boring. Anyway, in champ select they start talking like the know each other, I ask yhem for the size of the premade, they say 4 and the it begins. You better play well or we will flame and report you - I hate playing with premades - It's good for you, it will be easy as long as you don't suck beacuse we are 4 - The other team will have a 4-5 man premade aswell (end up being a 3 men premade), mo edge for me. I was 1st pick and lockd Lucian for Top (since the BC/YGB build I've played 23 games with him in top and I have a 71% win rate). Fucking flame, by the time the enemy team was on his 4th pick I tell'em - you know what? forget it, dodge, I will simply afk fucking abusers - seriously? - Yeh, won't play with assholes - do whatever you want. I closed the game during loading screen.

I know I could simply leave but I wanted to make them lose. By now idgaf about losing a match nor LP loss or rank. I won't simply tolarate this assholes just because it's a 4v1 and they will always be right. Screw those idiots, Riot can ban my account if they want aswell.

Dude. That's not cool. If you didn't want to play so much then you should have dodged.  I'd have reported you and I honestly hope they did. The premade was toxic too but that doesn't excuse threatening to AFK in the slightest.
Reporting them does do something. For example, I reported this post. Let's see what happens. Though judging by all your other toxic posts, it might not be mine that does it.
Seeing this after "Deleted post" honestly made me laugh. Thumbs up.

im bored and tired so I like lurking in the comments of threads.
love how you are using a smurf account to post it *claps*
Anyways, While I do agree that 4 man premades have no right to be disrespectful, and im sorry that they were being dicks to you, your action was just as bad as theirs. IK premades can be assholes sometimes but just playing the game the best you can and then reporting them afterwards would have been better than AFking. 
Like imagine if you were in that premade and all of the sudden that one solo que person just AFk's. That just isn't right dude ;/

Will say that these past few months have been the only times I have ever actually had to mute people in game because they were being complete butt faces ,3,
All this hate on premades when solo players that purposefully throw games because they're not doing so hot just slip on by.
That's because it's easier to rage at premades, as people will upvote anything bashing a premade

Eh.

I'm fine with em.

3 is the limit for me, though.

Quad queues are retarded, and 5's should be it's own ladder (like it was)

i've gotten into a few games with trio and quad ques

and lemme say i thoroughly enjoyed ruining the game for them
I miss Solo queue. I am really tried of being the the only one on my team that isn't on the same page when I chose to Solo rank. While playing with friends is fun I don't win as much in ranked.

I had a match where 3 of my team were together and me and one another werent.

Honestly i half expected them to ignore us all the time but they didnt, the match turned up quite enjoyable.

Still what I dont understand is why do people pick a {{champion:157}} mid when they see an wild {{champion:82}} coming mid? Do they think that they can kill him?

I mean, if it's me, then yes I would. Yasuo is my main, and I have hundreds of games of experience with him. I'm confident in my own ability to play yasuo into almost any matchup (fuck Kayle and Leblanc in general)

But you go close to Morde you die.

I mean all he needs to do is to keep his Shield up and slap you thrice xD
And all I need to do is keep at my max q range and farm
True that but with Rylai's that's nearly impossible :P
With a phage item and a phantom dancer, I'll have enough move speed (even with rylais) to just q 3 times, knock morde up, and keep moving :D

That's only if that Morde is going in a straight line :P

Me? I am Zig-Zaging it xD

But yeah good plan.
I mean, we can go all day about how we would counter each other. Point is, its hard, but its doable for both sides to take the other out. (Assuming the ones playing are both equally skilled)
That's true, lets just leave it at that haha.
Dynamic queue sucks.

Well, my experience with Trios is two-fold: either you get them on your team and they prioritize helping each other over you and the other person and thus you either go even in lane or fail, or you play against a trio and they lack team cohesion because they ignore their other two players and flaming ensues. All I know is, the amount of ragequitting and flaming has actually gone up since Dynamic Q was introduced.

I play mostly in a trio where I play sup and my two friends play ADC and top. My top friend actually ganks mid a lot more often than he teleganks or roams bot, and even when he gets his secondary, jungle, he prioritizes ganking top lane, as he knows that we can generally hold our own. 

I really hate that so many people keep saying that ALL premades are toxic to the solos and only care about their own.

Honestly my friends and I have never been toxic to the solos, and in all my solo games I've only had one or two toxic premades, which can easily just be chalked up to them being toxic players in general.

I didn't say all premades are toxic. I've had my share of nice groups. But there is a definite correlation to premade groups and a lack of communication with the rest of their team. Not all do this, but many do.
Apparently tho, statistics show that overall toxicity has gone down (don't remember where I saw said statistics)
Why are you tired of playing with/against trio parties?
Legitimate question to someone making an assertion with no clarification gets downvoted. Why?

> [{quoted}](name=Dr Midnight,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nE5ukc4F,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2016-06-13T13:00:38.940+0000)
>
> Legitimate question to someone making an assertion with no clarification gets downvoted. Why?

Don't even worry about it dude, it's mob mentality.

My two friends and I play mostly in a trio and we have never teamed up and flamed someone, or ignored a lane to gank each other. My top laner friend focuses mostly on roaming mid more than anything because he trusts me and our ADC, and even when he gets jungle, he mostly focuses on ganking top and mid. 

Even in my solo games I have only run into one or two premades that were toxic, and they were very likely just toxic players to begin with.

I don't understand why so many people want to generalize everything on these boards. "All premades team up and flame the solo players." That isn't true. That's like saying "all solo players think they're the be all end all carry and run into five alone and get mad when their team, which is getting dragon, didn't back them up in their tower dive." Does this happen? Yes, a lot. Is this all or even a majority of solo players? I would say no. So why are so many people doing the same thing to premades after a couple of bad ones?

God, another one of these DQ hate threads. When is this madness gonna stop ? 

Yall don't lose because of DQ, yall lose because the other team is better, it can happen even in SoloQ. Stop making these childish threads please.

You see, here is where you are missing the point.  **most of these threads aren't about winning or losing.**  You can take my match history as an example.  I was 16-4  in my last 20 before I decided to take long break.  The games simply haven't been fun.  Many solo players don't feel the impact of a game.  I can get thrashed in lane or I can dominate and it feels that I have very little impact.

I can't honestly think of a single game this season where I finished and thought "damn that was a really fun match."  I agree that the W/L ratio is probably the same, but the fun factor has been down for awhile.  Of course you probably won't read this with an open mind, so I'll stop here <3

> [{quoted}](name=Im So NaCl,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nE5ukc4F,comment-id=00080001,timestamp=2016-06-12T14:45:30.591+0000)
>
> You see, here is where you are missing the point.  **most of these threads aren't about winning or losing.**  You can take my match history as an example.  I was 16-4  in my last 20 before I decided to take long break.  The games simply haven't been fun.  Many solo players don't feel the impact of a game.  I can get thrashed in lane or I can dominate and it feels that I have very little impact.
> 
> I can't honestly think of a single game this season where I finished and thought "damn that was a really fun match."  I agree that the W/L ratio is probably the same, but the fun factor has been down for awhile.  Of course you probably won't read this with an open mind, so I'll stop here <3

Why would DQ be responsible for you feeling as though you have little impact ? I'm 14-6 in my last 20 and I know that I definitely had significant impact since half of those my team lost their lanes and fed their asses off.
